duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver sales results using a disciplined approach to sales by calling on hospitals, VAs, and outpatient rehabilitation institutions within a defined territory.
Regularly consult with customers to educate on the company's curated portfolio of products and conduct sales calls in person or through virtual meetings.
Sustain and grow all product and program offerings, provide trials and in-service of products, and develop a territory plan.
Manage territory to include analytics, maintain customer information within CRM tool, and supply necessary information for business operations.
Project a professional, ethical image and character of the Company and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required; Bachelor’s degree strongly preferred
